name: Vegan Banana Muffins
description: I can never say no to these vegan banana muffins! They are incredibly moist, delicious, and super easy to make! Besides, they're much healthier than most muffins and make an awesome afternoon snack or even breakfast!
recipeIngredient: 1  cup plant-based yogurt ((unsweetened soy or coconut yogurt))

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the bananas with a fork. Then prepare the "flax egg" a vegan egg replacement) by combining ground flax seeds and water and let it sit for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Mash the bananas with a fork. Then prepare the "flax egg" a vegan egg replacement) by combining ground flax seeds and water and let it sit for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients for the muffins including the flax egg. Stir with a spoon until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients for the muffins including the flax egg. Stir with a spoon until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Line a muffin tray with paper liners. Divide the mixture evenly among the 12 muffin paper liners. Sprinkle some chocolate chips and oats on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a muffin tray with paper liners. Divide the mixture evenly among the 12 muffin paper liners. Sprinkle some chocolate chips and oats on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F and bake the muffins for 20 minutes until they're golden brown. Transfer them to a cooling rack and let them cool down.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 °F and bake the muffins for 20 minutes until they're golden brown. Transfer them to a cooling rack and let them cool down.

keywords: how to make vegan banana muffins, vegan banana muffin recipe, vegan banana muffins
